duties_responsibilities.duty: Consistently meet revenue targets for new employer acquisition in the designated region.
Perform outreach and prospecting through varied channels to generate leads and nurture them through the sales process.
Be a product expert on the membership offering, maintain knowledge of fee-based services, and stay updated on new offerings.
Network and engage in sales activities to develop and nurture leads, including participation in events and external sources.
Conduct consultative sales calls and product demonstrations with key managers and senior-level executives, effectively positioning the value proposition of the membership.
Collaborate with Marketing to develop inbound membership inquiries, qualify, develop, and close, as well as to support all marketing initiatives.
Proactively document sales activities and manage the sales pipeline in the membership database.
Identify potential member organizations in the assigned region and develop and nurture those leads.
Engage in networking and sales activities, including participation in various events, to support Catapult's awareness-building efforts.
Proactively network monthly to develop referrals and relationships, and develop relationships with community resources to maximize opportunities.
Meet new member dues revenue goals and contribute to region member retention for 12 months.
May be assigned additional duties within Catapult to enhance member and non-member experiences.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in sales, marketing, human resources or other relevant field highly preferred.
